body: @thisisrandom6 and @d33znutz Hey you two! No hard feelings involved, but I just want to politely tell you something: Go fuck yourselves with your stupid curses, I'm a cosmic ancient and that doesn't affect me, I've been training the past weeks and now these weak curses don't stand a chance against me, and you know what? As we speak I have destroyed these malevolent curses that you two created and now the comment section is free of these curses so try to do better next time! I hope you both learn from this lesson.
Damn he’s a real lucky man going back to back to back, 7/10 for art style and 7/10 for plot, I want to see him going at it with Eirin too in the future.
https://imgur.com/a/qLhoSPn <<< link on the last page :3
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me Fuck too late
